Product Gallery Section.Layout: Grid layout with variable column numbers based on screen size, ranging from two columns on small screens to four columns on extra-large screens.
Product Gallery Section.Design: Clean and modern design with large product images, centered text overlays, and subtle hover effects.

Key Elements.Section Title: Centrally aligned, bold heading that introduces the section.
Key Elements.Product Cards: Each product is displayed in a card format featuring an image, category, and title. The image scales slightly on hover for a dynamic effect.
Key Elements.Image: High-quality, full-height image for each product, ensuring visual appeal.
Key Elements.Text Overlay: Overlay text describing the product category and name, centrally aligned for readability.
Key Elements.Hover Effect: Slight zoom effect on the product image when hovered over, attracting user interaction.

Product Gallery Section.Use Cases: Ideal for e-commerce websites and online stores showcasing various product collections or featured items. Can be used for fashion, electronics, home decor, or any other product-focused site.
